description: Returns the bundles that you can apply to a Amazon Lightsail bucket. The bucket bundle specifies the monthly cost, storage quota, and data transfer quota for a bucket. Use the UpdateBucketBundle action to update the bundle for a bucket.

nested_items.name: bundles
nested_items.description: An object that describes bucket bundles.

nested_items.name: price
nested_items.description: The monthly price of the bundle, in US dollars.

nested_items.name: storagePerMonthInGb
nested_items.description: The storage size of the bundle, in GB.

nested_items.name: transferPerMonthInGb
nested_items.description: The monthly network transfer quota of the bundle.

nested_items.name: isActive
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the bundle is active. Use for a new or existing bucket.
